featured.text: When the great Beethoven was asked to compose music for the guitar, he went into a rage and refused, but eventually even Beethoven could not ignore the challenge.
If you mistreat your body by keeping bad habits, 33 symptoms of illness, and ignoring common health rules, even the best medicine can be of little use.
What advice would Wesla most likely give other disabled people? (A) Ignore what you have lost and make the best use of what you have.
Some people smile at me, but others just ignore me.

other.text: What was the challenge that Beethoven could not ignore? 5.

By contrast, men are much more likely to interrupt (about three times as often in some studies), to argue about what has been said, to ignore or respond poorly to what has been said, to introduce more new topics into the conversation, and to make more assertions.
Sex differences should be ignored in education.

definition.zh_def: 不理會或不考慮某事或某人。
definition.en_def: To refuse to acknowledge or consider something or someone.
definition.example: She decided to ignore the negative comments and focus on her work.
